content: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Establishment Coordination-I

title: Establishment Coordination-I - Point 1
content: Policy and all reference regarding creation and filling up of posts in Government Department/ attached and subordinate offices/autonomous bodies.

title: Establishment Coordination-I - Point 2
content: Policy and all reference regarding revival of posts.

title: Establishment Coordination-I - Point 3
content: Continuation of all posts of the level of Joint Secretary and above.
